title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 622.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 622.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

Any trainee referred to and attending a training course
established in accordance with the provisions of article 23-A of the Labor Law
shall be entitled to transportation allowances as provided
herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
622.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
